data.name: Whispering Willows - Art Book, Soundtrack, and Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
• Digital Art Book - A 56 page Digital Art book exploring the concepts and style used to create the art of Whispering Willows
  • Soundtrack - 10 Tracks of original music from Whispering Willows
  • Wallpaper - 1920x1280 Wallpaper of Elena Elkhorn
data.about_the_game:
• Digital Art Book - A 56 page Digital Art book exploring the concepts and style used to create the art of Whispering Willows
  • Soundtrack - 10 Tracks of original music from Whispering Willows
  • Wallpaper - 1920x1280 Wallpaper of Elena Elkhorn
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 cpus 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 cpus 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 cpus 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
